display_long_description:
FootAR: The New Sports StandARd

Gamified Augmented Reality Experience

FootAR is not your ordinary sports app—it’s a gamified augmented reality (AR) experience that takes sports fandom to the next level. Imagine interacting with live sports data in real time while immersing yourself in the game through your Meta Quest headset. Let’s dive into the exciting features:

Livescore: Instant access to scores and detailed stats anytime, anywhere.
Prizes: Earn collectibles as you engage with the game—virtual trophies, exclusive content, and personalized rewards.
Highlights: Never miss crucial moments with match recaps.
xGoals: Dive into player performance—chance of scoring based on analytics.
Anywhere Access: From stadium seats to cozy living rooms, FootAR keeps you connected.
Lobby: Chat with fellow fans in real time and be part of the global sports community.


Who Is It For?

Sports Fans: Dive into the game like never before.
Telcos/Broadcasters: Enhance sports coverage with live data overlays.
Betting Enthusiasts: Make informed decisions.
Sports Clubs: Boost fan engagement.

Whether you’re a die-hard fan, a sports broadcaster, or just someone who loves the thrill of the game, put on your Meta Quest headset and step into the world of FootAR. 🎮🔥
